text: (o muslinlara!) Miru ila anandi: "Memu allah nu mariyu ayana ma koraku avatarimpajesina sandesalanu mariyu ibrahim, ismayil, is hakh, ya'akhub mariyu atani santati variki ivvabadina vatini mariyu musa, 'isa mariyu itara pravaktalandariki vari prabhuvu taraphu nundi ivvabadina vatini (sandesalanu) visvasistamu. Varilo e okkari patla memu bhedabhavam cupamu. Memu ayanaku vidheyulam (muslinlam) ayyamu
